name: Dvalin
title: "Dragon of the East" Dvalin
desc: "How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky."\n"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Dvalin

skills.name: Tempestuous Barrage
skills.desc: Deals 2 Anemo DMG. The target character receives Total Collapse.

skills.name: Dvalin's Cleansing
skills.desc: Deals 2 Anemo DMG and then separately performs "Prepare Skill" for Perpetual Cleansing and Ultimate Cleansing.

skills.name: Caelestinum Finale Termini
skills.desc: Deals 5 Anemo DMG. Applies Total Collapse to all opposing standby characters.
